commitResults.messageTitle: Added getCommand() method to Duke class to allow bot to read user inputs
Added more ability to store commands in a list and to list the stored commands in getCommand()
Created Task clas and modified getCommand() method to collect list of Task instead of list of Strings for commands
Allowed user to mark tasks as done, and to view status when asking for list
Moved blocks of code within the if else statements of getCommand() into their own functions to clean up code
Created ToDO class, made Task class abstract
Created Deadline Class
Created Event class, slight modification to toString of Deadline
Created functions to handle adding Todo, Deadline, Event in Duke class
Formatted toString in Deadline and Event. Finished functions for adding Todo, Deadline and Event to list in Duke
Created DukeException class
Added exception handling for when invalid command was given
Added exception handling for done command
Added exception handling for todo command
Added exception handling for adding deadline
Added exception handling for adding event, added more check cases to adding deadline
Added delete function
Turned all the available commands into an Enum (DukeCommands). Created an interface DukeFunctions to handle the functions associated with the commands.
Added automated testing, fixed some message formatting
Add toFile() method to Task and its child classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Task classes (e.g. Event, Deadline and Task) all need to be written to
duke.txt to be stored.

Giving each Task child class their own method follows OOP principles.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DukeFileIO.java and SAVE Enum to DukeCommands
commitResults.messageBody:
Methods are required to read/write data from/to duke.txt.

Creating DukeFileIO.java with methods to read current data from duke.txt
allows us to read past data from the user. Creating new Enum SAVE allows
users to instruct Duke to write all current data in list to duke.txt.

commitResults.messageTitle: Reading past data: removed extra space created
commitResults.messageBody:
Reading past data should store the previous data in the list in the same
way.

Fixing the extra space created allows users to have a consistent view on
their list of tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove duke.txt for testing
Add createDataFile() method to DukeFileIO class
commitResults.messageBody:
In the case that duke.txt is missing from the user's data folder, a new
duke.txt file should be created for them.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to store time in Deadline and Event as LocalDate
commitResults.messageBody:
Deadline and Event are Tasks that track dates.

Adding the ability to store time as LocalDate, enforces that users will
have standardized storage of Event and Deadline in their lists.
